column5: Woke up this morning and went out to balcony saw the rain coming down thought I'd smell the fresh scent of rain. Instead I smell carp. Guess its time to go carp fishing tomorrow. They are calling me by sending thier perfume my way.  And I'm no where close to a lake.  dsn
You should be fishing NOW!  It'll be absolutely PRIME when you get there
Was at the mouth of the Rouge last night, no carps caught.
I already had fresh carp slime on my hands earlier this week
